info.author: Daniel J. Popowich
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
A mod_python handler that uses instances of
      subclasses of class Servlet (thus its name) to respond to HTTP
      GET and POST requests.  For each request a series of methods are
      called on the instance, the output of such being sent to the
      client as the response.  This handler was inspired by WebWare.
info.name: mpservlets
info.html_description:
A mod_python handler that uses instances of
subclasses of class Servlet (thus its name) to respond to HTTP GET and POST requests. For each request a series of methods are called on the instance, the output of such being sent to the client as the response. This handler was inspired by WebWare.
